entities.entity:
<GROUND_RULES>
Use ONLY the explicit Q&A in the context. No assumptions.
If a field is not explicitly stated, output NULL.

OUTPUT EXACTLY 4 lines (no extra lines, no wrapping):
EE:
Sp:
Child:
Rehire:

Fragments only (no full sentences). Keep short.
Exclude: open enrollment/QLE, “making changes”, COBRA/HRA claims, coverage end/termination, contribution/participation/GI, other benefits.

FIELD RULES:
EE: hours/class + effective trigger (DOH / 90th day / 1st of month after X days). If one is missing, write the other; missing part = NULL.
Sp: spouse type only (legal spouse / domestic partner / common law) or NULL.
Child: child age limit only (to age 26 / EOM age 26 / etc.) or NULL.
Rehire: rehire/reinstatement threshold only (e.g., 90 days) or NULL.
</GROUND_RULES>

Eligibility Language Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_MEligibilityLanguageQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Return the 4-line Eligibility output. <Answer>
</QUESTIONS>

<EXAMPLES>
EE: 30 hrs/week, effective 1st of month after 30 days
Sp: legal spouse or domestic partner
Child: to age 26
Rehire: NULL

EE: 35 hrs/week, effective 1st of month after 30 days
Sp: legal spouse
Child: to age 26
Rehire: 90 days
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Base your response ONLY on the explicit questions and answers provided in the context below.
Do NOT add assumptions or policy knowledge not stated in the context.
If the topic cannot be answered from the provided context, output Null.
Output MUST be key findings only (telegram style), NOT a full sentence.
MAX 12 words total.
Prioritize termination timing + trigger (EOM/DOE), then continuation if explicitly stated.
No fluff (avoid “subject to”, “includes”, “may”, “under”).
Use commas to separate fragments; no line breaks.
</GROUND_RULES>

Termination Provisions Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_MTerminationProvisionQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Summarize the Termination Provision as key findings only. <Key findings/Null>
</QUESTIONS>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Termination Provision: <key findings>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Termination Provision: ends EOM employment termination, COBRA available
Termination Provision: ends DOE ineligibility, 30-day nonpayment grace, rescission fraud
</EXAMPLES>

<GROUND_RULES>
Base your response ONLY on the explicit questions and answers provided in the context below.
Do NOT add assumptions or policy knowledge not stated in the context.
If the topic cannot be answered from the provided context, output Null.
Output MUST be key findings only (telegram style), NOT a full sentence.
MAX 12 words total.
Prioritize broad exclusions + hard caps/limits + network restrictions (most material only).
No fluff (avoid “subject to”, “includes”, “may”, “under”).
Use commas to separate fragments; no line breaks.
</GROUND_RULES>

Exclusions & Limitations Q&A:
<CONTEXT>
{{DR_MExclusionLimitationQA}}
</CONTEXT>

<QUESTIONS>
Summarize the Exclusions and Limitations as key findings only. <Key findings/Null>
</QUESTIONS>

<OUTPUT_FORMAT>
Exclusions and Limitations: <key findings>
</OUTPUT_FORMAT>

<EXAMPLES>
Exclusions and Limitations: noncovered services, visit limits, option-specific max, network restrictions
Exclusions and Limitations: prior auth required, medical necessity limits, balance billing OON
</EXAMPLES>
